name: Ocean Savior
description:
Aliens are observing the Earth and they are not happy about millions of innocent ocean creatures dying from plastic wastes, they decided to send their own (one of a kind) fish, Bob has superpowers that should help in saving the ocean but he needs your help!

Controls:

  • Move with WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Shoot with Space key

Avoid:

  • Mines which kill you instantly
  • Plastics as they're not safe even for Aliens
  • Hurting other friendly fish

You can disable Music/Sound Effects in the options.

Have fun playing and saving the ocean!
